original_title: The Cheviot, the Stag and the Black, Black Oil
overview: The "ceilidh play", as writer John McGrath styled it, is presented in the BBC's 1974 "Play for Today" production to a live audience intercut with filmed reconstructions of the Highland Clearances and the Victorian obsession with hunting stags. Restored in high definition from the original film masters held in the BBC Archives.
title: The Cheviot, the Stag and the Black, Black Oil
